alert_module.description: Retrieve any type of alert on a selected AOI

alos_mosaics.description: Create and manipulate ALOS K&C Mosaics

bfast_explorer.description: Performs analysis of Landsat Surface Reflectance time series pixel data using the BFAST algorithm.

bfast_gpu.description: GPU implementation of the BFAST algorithm to analyse time series

clip-time-series.description: Generate a .pdf file containing time series clip on a given set of points

cusum.description: Spatially cumulative sum algorithm for change detection within univariate time-series (GPU powered)

fcdm.description: Mapping all kind of canopy disturbances (natural or human induced) within (semi-)evergreen forests

gfc_wrapper_python.description: Combine the GFC layers to produce a forest change map

gfc_wrapper_R.description: Combine the GFC layers to produce a forest change map

gwb.description: A suite of various geospatial image analysis tools

vector_manager.description: Tool to manage vector files in SEPAL (upload, download, export to GEE and grid generation)

sdg_indicator.description: Monitor SDG indicators at plot level

sepal_mgci.description: Calculates the SDG 15.4.2: Mountain Green Cover Index at national/sub-regional scale

sepal_pysmm.description: Tool for mapping surface soil moisture based on Copernicus Sentinel-1 intensity data.

seplan.description: Restoration planning tool using a weighted-sum approach

smfm_biota.description: Calculate biomass change over time using ALOS Palsar data

smfm_deforest.description: Detect deforestation using a time-series of forest probabilities

gee-source.description: Extract source code from any GEE app URL

weplan.description: Explore restoration planning solution provided by WePlan - Forests

basin-river.description: Get Forest Cover Change by upstream sub-catchment
